### EXISTING STRUCTURES

-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
-  Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) 

### Iron Ore Mining at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner Mining Drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 
-  Chest (position x=-16.5, y=-49.5) 

### Electricity Generation at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Steam Engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5) 
-  Boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5) 
-  Offshore Pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5) 
-  Pipe Group (fluid system 11306) 

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Lab (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Burner Inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) 
-  Small Electric Pole (position x=2.5, y=1.5) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert items into entities
-  Make sure the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting to insert it
### Errors when trying to set research
-  Ensure that the lab has the required science packs to set research
### Errors when trying to get research progress
-  Ensure that the lab has an active research in progress to get research progress
### Errors when trying to extract items from entities
-  Ensure that the entity has items to extract before attempting to extract
### Errors when burner mining drills are out of fuel
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate
### Errors when boilers are out of fuel
-  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate
### Errors when steam engines have no input liquid
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a connected pipe with liquid to operate
### Errors when steam engines have no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a connected pipe with fluid to operate
